ygData.subject: Re: Fighting at Maxi City
ygData.msgSnippet: Spasstik bounded towards Megatron, carefully holding Soundwave between his razor like jaws. As he slowed his pace pulling up beside the tyrant. Megatron

Spasstik bounded towards Megatron, carefully holding Soundwave between
his razor like jaws. As he slowed his pace pulling up beside the tyrant.

Megatron reached down and hooked his fusion cannon to his arm. He then
looked down, "Soundwave, Eject the Frenzy cassette. Immidiatly the
cassette door on Soundwave opened up, as the red and black cassette flew
loose, then transforming and growing into the cassette warrior. 

Soundwave then autimatically realayed the message from Perceptor to
Megatron. "We are currently pulling out, but Firestrike has gone crazy,
and I can't afford to lose any troops right now. Continue towards base."
He looked down to Frenzy. "Frenzy pull Soundwave and Triggerhappy out of
here." Then he turned his attention to Spasstik and Blowpipe, "Prepare
to open fire on my mark." Frenzy took the miniature cassette player
(Soundwave) from Spasstik, then gripped Triggerhappy as best as he
could, slowly lifting him from the ground.

Megatron then pointed to Prowl, "Smelt him down." Megatron then aimed
his cannon at the Maximal leader, and fired a fusion blast.

Spasstik picked different targets however. His duel laser cannons
targeting the running Groove. Both let out a laser beam towards the
Protectobot. Then his rear anti neutrino grenade launchers aimed
upwards, arcking off two grenades into the middle of the Protectobot
formation, as the Decepticon wolf snarled with fury.
